testcase.name: new MaxCacher(conn,environment) should return a class
getHash should return a string different if parameters are different
getMax should call conn.readSingleValue null when there is no selector
getMax should not call conn.readSingleValue null when there is no selector the 2th time is called
getMax should call conn.readSingleValue when there is selector but parent not added
getMax SHOULD call relation.getParents when there is selector but parent not added
getMax SHOULD NOT call relation.getParents when there is selector but parent not added - 2th call in a row
getMax should NOT call conn.readSingleValue when there is selector and parent is added and autoincrement
getMax SHOULD call conn.readSingleValue when there is selector and parent is added but NOT autoincrement
getMax SHOULD call conn.readSingleValue when there is selector and parent is autoincrement but NOT added
